channel.title: Compile Errors, I keep getting the same type!
channel.description:
I keep getting errors that say "class or interface expected". Ok, now, sorry to sound like a noob, but I am. How do I fix this class and interface problem?
Heres my compile errors: [code]client.java:11020: illegal start of type else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) ^ client.java:11259: <identifier> expected } ^ client.java:11261: 'class' or 'interface' expected else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("setitem") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ad min")) ^ client.java:11815: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ client.java:29306: 'class' or 'interface' expected }; ^ NPCHandler.java:684: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^ NPCHandler.java:685: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:906: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int worldmap2[][] = { ^ NPCHandler.java:915: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn't remove - xerozcheez
^ NPCHandler.java:916: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2}; ^ NPCHandler.java:918: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int randomremoveschaos() ^ NPCHandler.java:1452: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ NPCHandler.java:1453: 'class' or 'interface' expected ^ Player.java:6: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static boolean playerIsWaiting = false; ^ Player.java:7: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static boolean playerIsBoat = false; ^ PlayerHandler.java:5: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int getID(String name) ^ 16 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Anyone know?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 07:36:30 PM[/size][hr]anyone

item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Thx, i’ll try that, even though I diden’t mess around with anything exept yell[br][size=1]Posted at: November 27, 2006, 09:36:30 PM[/size][hr]That seemed like a good idea at the time, but I compared the new client.java, and my client.java, and the parts that are getting errors are the same as the new client.java, but the new client.java isen’t getting any errors.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 27, 2006, 10:05:38 PM[/size][hr]I scratched my server, and pasted the “clean” client.java and npchandler.java, and I still have 3 errors! That make no sense!

Player.java:6: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static boolean playerIsWaiting = false; ^ Player.java:7: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static boolean playerIsBoat = false; ^ PlayerHandler.java:5: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int getID(String name) ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
